title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: CAI-Integrated Instructional Design for Database Systems Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Perform database querying/manipulation functions with over 90% accuracy through SQL query writing and optimization.
Apply relational database design principles to resolve normalization and denormalization issues.
Achieve an understanding of transaction management and concurrency control concepts at over 85% through the tutorial mode of the CAI system.
Acquire the ability to diagnose and correct actual database errors through a web-based drill-and-practice module.

Learners can analyze the latest technological trends in medical/nursing databases (e.g., FHIR standards, cloud-based EHR systems) using at least three external learning resources (online documents/tutorials) and submit a 500+ character summary report or a 5-minute presentation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
